title: Scunci Effortless Beauty Thermal Twisters
description: With scunci effortless beauty hair accessories a woman should never have a bad hair day. twisters are an essential for any woman with hair below chin length. keeps hair off the face while growing out or during sports. easily put hair up into a high ponytail or use low at the nape. wear one or mix for unique looks. good for quick casual style when you have to run out for errands. soft thermal material won't damage hair. basic soft primary colors, black, grey and white.

title: Scunci Effortless Beauty Thick Hair No-damage Bright Elastics, 5Mm, 24-Count
description: Scunci effortless beauty no-damage bright elastics are your secret to effortless all-day hold. slide into any situation without worrying about hair slippage. specially designed for thick hair. soft metal-free elastic bands keep ponytails tight while working out or for casual style and won't damage your hair. 24 pack ensures that no matter where you put one down you'll always be able to pick one up. bright primary colors and neutral shades to complement any outfit or hair color.

title: Vidal Sassoon Medium No Crimper Elastics, Neutral, 30 Count
description: Medium Thickness Neutral No Crimper Elastics have no metal crimp to catch on, break, or tangle your hair. The braided construction also helps prevent tangling and catching on hair. Colors: comes with elastics in shades of brown, green, black, and white. Includes 30 braided construction elastic ponytailers.

title: Olay 4-In-1 Daily Facial Cloths, Combination/Oily Skin 33 Count
description: If you have oily or combination skin, you need more than a basic cleanser to eliminate impurities and clean your skin right down to the pores. Olay 4-in-1 Daily Facial Cloths for combination/oily skin contain the cleansing power of a liquid cleanser, toner, mask or scrub all in one. Dermatologist-tested, these facial cloths cleanse, exfoliate, tone and hydrate to provide a deep cleaning that gives you smoother-looking skin in just one week!Each soap-free cloth contains an essential cleansing formula with pro-vitamin B5, beta hydroxy acid and soothing witch hazel. They have two sides: a smooth side and a textured side with over 3,000 microbeads to gently break up dirt, oil and make-up  even mascara. Just wet with water, rub to lather and flip between the smooth and beaded sides for gentle cleansing and all-over exfoliation. Taking care of your skin doesn't need to be complicated. Olay keeps it simple with 4-in-1 Daily Facial Cloths for combination/oily skin so you can wipe away make-up, dirt and impurities in one simple step.

title: My Konjac Sponge All Natural Fiber Wave Body Sponge
description: Enjoy your bath time with this all natural fiber 6 wave knock body sponge by My Konjac Sponge. This product is made from 100% eco friendly ingredients and features a natural sponge created from the knock plant.

title: PUEEN Super Slim 168 Nail Stamping Plates Synthetic Leather Holder Case Organizer in Hot Pink Rosy Lace Pattern
description: We are so happy to introduce our new 168 nail image stamping plates holder for your travel and daily storage needs.This rosy lace patterned nail stamping plates holder is super slim with double sided and matte finished slots which will hold 168 of our standard nail art plates or 3D nail stickers perfectly.Great way to organize your nail image stamping platesEach case has 14 double-sided pages which give a total of 168 slots per caseEach slot measures 6 cm x 6.5 cm which will fit standard plates as well as nail art stickers perfectlyNow available in hot pink with lovely floral lace patternCases only (image plates are sold separately)Material: Synthetic leather with rosy lace patternCase Size: 8.5 x 5.5 inchesSlot Size: 6 cm x 6.5 cmStyle: 14 double-side pages, 12 slots on each pageCapacity: Each case has 168 individual slotsPage Finish: Matte, see-through vinyl pages
